summary.title: I love my profession!
summary.content:
I love that I'm pushed to keep on working my skills to produce better products! I love to figure out how to improve the work environment of my teams to make their job easier and their work more efficient! I love to share my experience and benefitting from the experience of others!

With that out of the way:

summary.title: Hi!
summary.content:
I'm Tobias, a passionate Software (Web) Developer and Tech Lead since over 10 years. Even though my focus has been the frontend side of web applications, especially using TypeScript and React, I always enjoyed the chance to look beyond that and be more involved in a fullstack scope.

Beyond coding, what I enjoy most, is taking ownership of the critical technical challenges and ensuring that the company vision is reflected in architecture and code, while enabling my team to work as efficiently as they can.

summary.title: My Principles
summary.content:
❶ Communicate respectfully and transperantly
❷ Have a requirements focused architectual and development process
❸ Achieve good and maintainable code, based on the architecture, automated testing and the concept of polite code (https://youtu.be/7EmboKQH8lM?t=3160)
❹ Clear the path of obstacles for the team ⟶ the team is king
❺ Share knowledge within your team and beyond

work.name: Medtower UG
work.summary:
Medtower UG develops soft- and hardware solutions to make tasks in hospitals more transparent and productive.

Project: Medtower Radar
With the combination of the self devloped IoT hard- and software, the Medtower Radar enables hospital employees to observe and react to position and status changes of devices, like beds and wheelchairs for optimising work processes.

My Focal Points:
- Development of interactive mockups with React
- Architecture of the backend and frontend
- Design of domains, APIs and microservices
- Communication with AMQP 1.0 and Apache Qpid Message Broker
- Providing data in real time to the frontend with AMQP 1.0
- Providing the geo and map specific information in an offline environment with OpenMapTiles Server
- Development of Node.js microservices with TypeScript, Express and MongoDB
- Development of the frontend with TypeScript and React
- AMQP 1.0 communication with rhea.js
- State management with Context API and Render Prop Components
- Styling with SCSS and Bulma
- 3D indoor map with d3-geo and mapbox-gl
- 360 degree panorama pictures with pannellum-react
- Orchestrating module with Docker Compose
- Mentoring and coaching of coworkers

Project: Individual ETL Solutions
Design and implementation of individual ETL solutions with Apache NIFI, Apache Flink and Node.js, for supporting customers with data migration, transformation and reporting tasks.

My Focal Points:
- Development of ETL processes with Apache NIFI, Apache Flink, Node.js, SQL, CSV, JSON and MongoDB
- Management of the external work of a Apache NIFI consulting company
